00040 /*
00041   An event processor cannot be started without an initialization
00042   message that includes a product registry.  The product registry
00043   is necessary to configure the input and output modules.  Unfortunately
00044   this registry comes from the remote system.
00045 
00046   What this means is that something happens that I cannot remember.
00047 
00048   JBK Note: with the threading use in all these objects, once the 
00049   stop is called, the processing cannot be restarted.
00050  */
00051 
00052 using namespace std;
00053 
00054 // -----------------------------------------------
00055 
00056 // this dleter is particular to this test.  It should really be
00057 // defined in TestFileReader.h
00058 
00059 namespace {
00060   string getFileContents(const string& conffile)
00061   {
00062     struct stat b;
00063     if(stat(conffile.c_str(),&b)<0)
00064       {
00065   cerr << "Cannot stat() file " << conffile << endl;
00066   abort();
00067       }
00068     
00069     fstream ist(conffile.c_str());
00070     if(!ist)
00071       {
00072   cerr << "Could not open file " << conffile << endl;
00073   abort();
00074       }
00075     
00076     string rc(b.st_size,' ');
00077     ist.getline(&rc[0],b.st_size,fstream::traits_type::eof());
00078     return rc;
00079   }
00080 }
00081 
00082 static void deleteBuffer(void* v)
00083 {
00084   stor::FragEntry* fe = (stor::FragEntry*)v;
00085   delete [] (char*)fe->buffer_address_;
00086 }

00089 
00090 class Main // : public xdaq::Application
00091 {
00092  public:
00093   //XDAQ_INSTANTIATOR();
00094   //Main(xdaq::ApplicationStub* s);
00095 
00096   //Main(const string& fu_config_file,
00097   Main(const string& my_config_file,
00098        const vector<string>& file_names);
00099   ~Main();
00100   
00101   int run();
00102 
00103  private:
00104   // disallow the following
00105   //Main(const Main&):jc_(new stor::JobController("",deleteBuffer)) { }
00106   Main& operator=(const Main&) { return *this; }
00107 
00108   stor::JobController* jc_;
00109   vector<string> names_;
00110   typedef boost::shared_ptr<edmtestp::TestFileReader> ReaderPtr;
00111   typedef vector<ReaderPtr> Readers;
00112   Readers readers_;
00113   log4cplus::Logger logger_;
00114 };
00115 
00116 // ----------- implementation --------------
00117 
00118 Main::~Main() { 
00119  
00120    delete jc_;
00121  
00122 }

00124 #if 0

00129 
00130 
00131 //Main::Main(const string& fu_config_file,
00132 Main::Main(const string& my_config_file,
00133      const vector<string>& file_names):
00134   names_(file_names),
00135   logger_(log4cplus::Logger::getRoot())  // placeholder, overwritten below
00136 {
00137   StreamerInputFile stream_reader(file_names[0]);
00138   const InitMsgView* init =  stream_reader.startMessage();
00139   std::auto_ptr<edm::SendJobHeader> header = edm::StreamerInputSource::deserializeRegistry(*init);
00140 
00141   edm::ProductRegistry pr;
00142   const edm::SendDescs& descs = header->descs();
00143   edm::SendDescs::const_iterator i(descs.begin()), e(descs.end());
00144   for(; i != e; ++i) {
00145         pr.copyProduct(*i);
00146         //FDEBUG(6) << "StreamInput prod = " << i->className() << endl;
00147     }
00148 
00149   log4cplus::BasicConfigurator config;
00150   config.configure();
00151   logger_ = log4cplus::Logger::getInstance("main");
00152 
00153   //jc_ = new stor::JobController(pr,
00154   jc_ = new stor::JobController(getFileContents(my_config_file),
00155                                 logger_,&deleteBuffer);
00156 
00157   vector<string>::iterator it(names_.begin()),en(names_.end());
00158   for(;it!=en;++it)
00159     {
00160       ReaderPtr p(new edmtestp::TestFileReader(*it,
00161                  jc_->getFragmentQueue(),
00162                  pr));
00163                  //jc_->products()));
00164       readers_.push_back(p);
00165     }
00166 }
00167 
00168 int Main::run()
00169 {
00170   jc_->start();
00171 
00172   // start file readers
00173   Readers::iterator it(readers_.begin()),en(readers_.end());
00174   for(;it!=en;++it)
00175     {
00176       (*it)->start();
00177     }
00178   // wait for all file readers to complete
00179   for(it=readers_.begin();it!=en;++it)
00180     {
00181       (*it)->join();
00182     }
00183 
00184   jc_->stop();
00185   jc_->join();
00186 
00187   return 0;
00188 }

00193 void printusage(char* cmdname)
00194 {
00195   cerr << "The last argument must be --file X" << endl;  
00196 }
00197 
00198 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00199 {
00200   // pull options out of command line
00201   //if(argc < 4)
00202   if(argc < 3)
00203     {
00204       //cerr << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " trigger_config my_config "
00205       cerr << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " my_config "
00206      << "file1 file2 ... fileN\n"
00207      << "my_config must be given along with at "
00208      << "least one file name";
00209       throw cms::Exception("config") << "Bad command line arguments\n";
00210     }
00211   
00212   edm::service::MessageServicePresence theMessageServicePresence;
00213   edmplugin::PluginManager::configure(edmplugin::standard::config());
00214 
00215   //string fu_config_file(argv[1]);
00216   string my_config_file(argv[1]);
00217   vector<string> file_names;
00218   
00219   //for(int i=3;i<argc;++i)
00220   for(int i=2;i<argc;++i)
00221     file_names.push_back(argv[i]);
00222 
00223   try {
00224     edm::loadExtraClasses(); 
00225     //Main m(fu_config_file,my_config_file,file_names);
00226     Main m(my_config_file,file_names);
00227     m.run();
00228   }
00229   catch(cms::Exception& e)
00230     {
00231       cerr << "Caught an exception:\n" << e.what() << endl;
00232       throw;
00233     }
00234   catch(std::exception& e)
00235     {
00236       cerr << "Caught an exception:\n" << e.what() << endl;
00237       throw;
00238     }
00239   catch(...)
00240   {
00241       cerr << "Caught unknown exception\n" << endl;
00242   }
00243 
00244   return 0;
00245 }
